items.sentence: Tom wore hand-me-down clothes from his older brother.
Tom would still be alive if he had been more careful.
Why do I get the feeling I\'m not going to like this?
It\'s almost three hundred miles to Boston from here.
It\'s already been three years since Tom passed away.
We purchased a new house for eighty thousand dollars.
We sent some flowers to the hospital to cheer her up.
We showed Tom some of the pictures we took in Boston.
We took advantage of the fine weather to play tennis.
I suspect that Tom and Mary aren\'t in Australia now.
